organizations: Weekly Blitz Luke Matheson & Jason Kilburn
title: ArkansasVarsity.com Week 8 Weekly Blitz
text:
ArkansasVarsity.com Week 8 Weekly Blitz Luke Matheson & Jason Kilburn CLICK HERE TO SUBSCRIBE TO ARKANSASVARSITY.COM 
NOTE: THIS WEEK'S PODCAST IS DEDICATED TO THE MEMORY OF FORMER NORTH LITTLE ROCK RUNNING BACK ALTEE TENPENNY. OUR THOUGHTS AND PRAYERS GO OUT TO HIS FAMILY, FRIENDS, TEAMMATES, AND LOVED ONES. 
We are now in week eight of the 2015 Arkansas high school football season, and there are several great games taking place this week. 
ArkansasVarsity.com publisher Luke Matheson, recruiting analyst Jason Kilburn, and Gray's Power Poll publisher Steve Gray take a look at several top games this week, including Arkadelphia vs Ashdown, Bryant vs. Van Buren, Catholic vs. Conway, Camden Harmony Grove vs. Smackover, Des Arc vs. Hazen, Haskell Harmony Grove vs. Prescott, Robinson vs. Dardanelle, and Warren vs. Monticello. 
Coach Brad Bolding joins us as well to talk about the life of Altee Tenpenny , the former North Little Rock four star running back who tragically lost his life Tuesday night in a single car accident. 
Additionally, we discuss several in-state recruits including Bentonville five star Malik Monk , Little Rock Christian lineman Dylan Hays , Little Rock Christian wide receiver Joe Hampton , Camden Harmony Grove quarterback C.J. Parham , Smackover athlete Jordan Jones , Robinson running back T.J. Hammonds , and more. 
You can listen to this week's podcast in the audio player below.
